name: Opus Interactive
tag_list: managed-hosting, dedicated-servers, virtual-servers, virtualization, shared-hosting, colocation, iaas, saas, business-hosting, web-hosting
overview:
Opus Interactive is a Portland based company acting as full eco-aware internet data center providing managed hosting services, virtual server hosting, application hosting, agency hosting services, dedicated servers, co-location, data backup and recovery services, IaaS and SaaS. At Opus Interactive servers are not just hardware, they’re the human element within web hosting solutions, server virtualization technology, and managed IT services.

Whether a business needs web hosting, virtual dedicated servers, virtual private servers, fully managed IT hosting services, IaaS or SaaS solutions, Opus Interactive have the technology, the flexibility and most importantly the people acting as our human servers to create the right solution.

The main data center, located in Portland, Oregon is SAS 70 Certified and built using a high-density, high-efficiency model, with only the leading hosting industry technologies.
